import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Carousel, Accordion, Form, Modal, ProgressBar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function HomePage() { useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.add('visible'); } }); }); const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.scroll-fade-in'); elements.forEach(el => observer.observe(el)); }, []); return ( <> {/* Hero Section with Parallax */}

ExamiVana: Revolutionize Online Examinations

Empower educators and students with secure, interactive, and intelligent assessment tools.

 {/* Interactive Features Section with Flip Cards */}

Why Choose ExamiVana?

Trusted by institutions worldwide for seamless, professional exam management.
Secure & Compliant JWT authentication, encrypted data, and deadline enforcement ensure integrity and privacy.

Advanced security features for peace of mind!
Smart Timers & Auto-Grading Real-time countdowns, auto-submit, and instant scoring with detailed remarks.

Efficient and automated grading system!
Integrated Communication Private chat between teachers and students for support and feedback.

Seamless interaction for better learning!

Name Email Message
{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

 How secure is ExamiVana? ExamiVana uses JWT authentication, encrypted data, and deadline enforcement to ensure exam integrity and privacy. Can I take exams on mobile? Yes, ExamiVana is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile and PC devices. What if I miss the deadline? Exams are inaccessible after the deadline, and students will see a message indicating the exam is no longer available. Is there a free trial? Yes, sign up for the Free plan to try basic features with up to 10 exams. How does auto-grading work? Our system automatically scores MCQ exams and provides remarks based on performance (Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor). ); } export default HomePage;
